title: The maximum permissible total built up area shall not exceed 10% of gross area with only G + 1 structure having height not more than 9
clause_text: The maximum permissible total built up area shall not exceed 10% of gross area with only G + 1 structure having height not more than 9.0 m. and it should blend with surrounding
section: The norms for buildings shall be as follows -
